title: Plants Landing Page
description: Plants is a landing page designed to showcase garden plant growing and care services.

title: Shelter Website
description: A website built to help animals find shelter. The project consists of two pages, designed to guide users in providing support to animals in need.

title: Minesweeper Game
description: A classic Minesweeper game with multiple difficulty levels, responsive UI, sound effects, and themes. Advanced features enhance the traditional gameplay experience.

title: CSS Selectors Game
description: An interactive game designed to help users learn and master CSS selectors by solving challenges based on real-world scenarios.

title: MovieStream
description: An E-Commerce application distributing the latest movie releases from leading streaming platforms. It features quick search, an intuitive registration panel, and smooth checkout with a user-friendly interface.
details: Technologies: React, TypeScript, Vite, ESLint, Jest, API CommerceTools

title: GraphiQL Playground/IDE
description: An open-source playground and IDE for GraphQL requests. GraphiQL provides an interactive graphical interface to interact with GraphQL APIs.
details: Technologies: React, Redux, TypeScript, Vite, ESLint, Jest

title: Rick and Morty API Project
description: A project utilizing the Rick and Morty API. It displays characters and episodes from the show, offering search and pagination features in a simple interface.
details: Technologies: React, Redux, TypeScript, Vite, ESLint, Jest

title: Flower Boutique Mirano
description: An online store for Flower Boutique Mirano, offering exclusive handcrafted bouquets, personalized greeting cards, and unique toys. Some data may take a few seconds to load from an external API.
details: Technologies: React, Redux, SCSS, TypeScript, Vite

title: PetShop Online Store
description: A modern online store offering a wide range of pet products with a convenient interface. Some data may take time to load as it is fetched from an external API.

title: Cup Time Online Store
description: A cozy online shop offering a curated selection of teas, coffees, Turkish coffee pots, teapots, and more. Some data may take a few seconds to load from an external API.
details: Technologies: React, Redux, SCSS, TypeScript, Vite
